ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform API
ecommerce.problem: Building a scalable backend for an online store that handles product catalog, user authentication, cart management, and order processing.
ecommerce.solution: Designed a layered architecture with ASP.NET Core Web API. Implemented JWT authentication, repository pattern for data access, and proper transaction handling for order processing.
ecommerce.highlight: Focused on separation of concerns and proper error handling. Used Entity Framework Core with optimized queries to prevent N+1 problems.

inventory.title: Inventory Management System
inventory.problem: A warehouse needed real-time stock tracking with alerts for low inventory and support for multiple warehouse locations.
inventory.solution: Built a Web API with SQL Server backend. Implemented stored procedures for complex stock calculations and background services for inventory alerts.
inventory.highlight: Designed the database schema to handle concurrent updates safely using proper isolation levels and optimistic concurrency.

taskmanager.title: Task Management API
taskmanager.problem: Creating a collaborative task management system with role-based permissions, task assignments, and deadline tracking.
taskmanager.solution: Developed with ASP.NET Core using Clean Architecture. Implemented role-based authorization, task workflows, and email notifications for deadlines.
taskmanager.highlight: Applied SOLID principles throughout. Used MediatR for CQRS pattern to separate read and write operations cleanly.
